text:
@realDonaldTrump That's hilarious,  the President having a campaign commercial in the middle of THE Coronavirus briefing?
This was a WH production!
May I suggest, the mini clown car as the finale or dancing chickens!
Any updates to the virus or just BACK, PEDDLING BY TRUMP?
